-[ ] Review release notes from the release DRI
-[ ] Create blog
-[ ] clone docs
-[ ] create new release page
-[ ] create a pull request
-[ ] linkedin posting
-[ ] twitter posting
-[ ] telegram posting
-[ ] reddit posting
-[ ] demos
